A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ouch. Harrison Ford’s breathing a sigh of relief he wasn’t involved in this mess. It’s basically\, Battlestar Galactica Lite\, with signifantly less character development. Some cool moments\, but the script was god-awful\, especially the humor”. What are the critics thinking? The pacing was really off\, and many scenes played like video game quest intros. Wow. I may be done with Star Wars. Who would’ve thought?...
